column2: The former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia

column1:
a: Data refer to 2017 or the most recent year available.
b: Based on Barro and Lee (2016).
c: Updated by HDRO based on data from UNESCO Institute for Statistics (2018).
d: Updated by HDRO using Barro and Lee (2016) estimates.
e: Based on data from United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF) Multiple Indicator Cluster Surveys for 2006-2017.
f: Updated by HDRO based on data from ICF Macro Demographic and Health Surveys for 2006-2017.
g: Based on data from OECD (2017a).
h: Updated by HDRO based on Syrian Center for Policy Research (2017).
